Type.Name: SelectionRequestEventHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SelectionRequestEventHandler(object o, SelectionRequestEventArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed SelectionRequestEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the SelectionRequestEventHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the SelectionRequestEventHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the SelectionRequestEventHandler is removed from the event.
